channel.title: Registrations on Software Architecture Forum: A Self-Organizing Open Spaces Conference in Crested Butte, Colorado Sept 25 - 29, 2017
channel.description: Recent content in Registrations on Software Architecture Forum: A Self-Organizing Open Spaces Conference in Crested Butte, Colorado Sept 25 - 29, 2017

item.title: Registration
item.description:
Next:

Click here to generate a join request for the Twist group. (You might need to right click on this link and select “Open Link With…” and then choose your email service on the resulting submenu).

You’ll get an invitation to join the Twist group. This is the central information hub for the conference. You can post any questions about the conference including those about ride sharing and group house rentals.
